articles.title: Atlantic Ocean Currents Are Collapsing, and the Consequences Could Be Disastrous - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: A new peer-reviewed study finds the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) could collapse as early as 2055.
articles.content: A newly published peer-reviewed study in the Journal of Geophysical Research: Oceans suggests that the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) a major system of ocean currents that regulat… [+5326 chars]
